# Change Log

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file. See Conventional Commitsopen in new window for commit guidelines.

# 2.0.0-beta.22open in new window (2021-07-11)

# Bug Fixes

  • markdown: resolve assets links in html img tags (close #254open in new window) (7cbb163open in new window)

# 2.0.0-beta.21open in new window (2021-07-03)

# Bug Fixes

  • markdown: filter permalink symbol in toc (close #251open in new window) (5a35806open in new window)

# 2.0.0-beta.20open in new window (2021-06-26)

# Features

  • markdown: bump markdown-it-anchor to 8.0.4 (41338f7open in new window)

# BREAKING CHANGES

  • markdown: markdown.anchor has changed, see changelog of markdown-it-anchor 8.0.0

# 2.0.0-beta.19open in new window (2021-06-19)

Note: Version bump only for package @vuepress/markdown

# 2.0.0-beta.18open in new window (2021-06-12)

# Features

  • markdown: add extract-title plugin (e0a1556open in new window)

# 2.0.0-beta.15open in new window (2021-05-27)

# Bug Fixes

  • markdown: decode assets link to ensure bundler can find the file (#144open in new window) (d3e5409open in new window)

# 2.0.0-beta.13open in new window (2021-05-06)

# Bug Fixes

  • markdown: ensure ending newline in import code (160df2dopen in new window)

# Features

  • markdown: allow omitting start or end of import code lines range (21bba5copen in new window)

# 2.0.0-beta.12open in new window (2021-04-30)

# Features

  • core: make filePath available in markdown env (aa52549open in new window)
  • markdown: support import code blocks (close #15open in new window) (fe20cccopen in new window)

# 2.0.0-beta.11open in new window (2021-04-28)

Note: Version bump only for package @vuepress/markdown

# 2.0.0-beta.9open in new window (2021-04-21)

# 2.0.0-beta.4open in new window (2021-03-20)

# Code Refactoring

# BREAKING CHANGES

  • markdown: prismjs is no longer the default syntax highlighter

# 2.0.0-alpha.1 (2020-12-01)

# Bug Fixes

  • markdown: do not add prefix to external images (dc75f57open in new window)
  • markdown: escape text token (f226d54open in new window)

# Features

  • markdown: add assetsPlugin to handle assets links (79e50b5open in new window)
  • markdown: add code plugin (0e29d69open in new window)
  • markdown: allow disable built-in plugins (a0746e5open in new window)
  • markdown: enable line numbers by default (44b1e47open in new window)
  • markdown: migrate to markdown-it-toc-done-right (5f9f092open in new window)
  • markdown: support highlight-lines in code plugin (932b737open in new window)
